embedding.apiKey.label: OpenAI API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for OpenAI embeddings (or use ${OPENAI_API_KEY})

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Inject relevant memories (true/false or object with enabled, maxTokens, maxPerMemoryChars)

autoRecall.maxPerMemoryChars.label: Auto-Recall max chars per memory
autoRecall.maxPerMemoryChars.help: Truncate each memory to N chars; 0 = no truncation

autoRecall.injectionFormat.label: Auto-Recall injection format
autoRecall.injectionFormat.help: full = [backend/category] text, short = category: text, minimal = text only (saves tokens)

autoRecall.limit.label: Auto-Recall limit
autoRecall.limit.help: Max memories to consider for injection (default 5)

captureMaxChars.label: Capture max characters
captureMaxChars.help: Max characters per fact: filter in auto-capture and truncate when storing (default 5000)

categories.label: Custom Categories
categories.help: Additional memory categories beyond the defaults (preference, fact, decision, entity, other)

autoClassify.enabled.label: Auto-Classify
autoClassify.enabled.help: Use a cheap LLM to classify 'other' facts into proper categories on capture and via CLI

autoClassify.model.label: Classify Model
autoClassify.model.help: Cheap/fast model for classification (e.g. gpt-4.1-nano, gpt-4o-mini)

categories.description: Custom categories to add alongside defaults
